price: Bunu birbirlerine vasiyet mi ettiler? Doğrusu onlar, taşkın bir toplum idiler.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
